about_the_game:
Add legendary Japanese pro-wrestler and MMA combatant Yoshihiro Takayama to your roster with this character pack DLC.

[CONTENTS]
Edit Wrestler: Yoshihiro Takayama
New Move: [Front Grapple (BIG)] > Spirit Punch Rush

All Spike Chunsoft revenue will be donated to TAKAYAMANIA, a foundation established to help support Mr. Takayama and his family.
Mr. Takayama was paralyzed from the neck down from a wrestling accident during a match on May 4, 2017.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card with minimum 512MB of VRAM
